00017 #ifndef BOOST_MPL_AUX_PREPROCESSOR_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_HPP_INCLUDED
00018 #define BOOST_MPL_AUX_PREPROCESSOR_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_HPP_INCLUDED
00019 
00020 #include "boost/mpl/limits/arity.hpp"
00021 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/dtp.hpp"
00022 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/preprocessor.hpp"
00023 
00024 #include "boost/preprocessor/comma_if.hpp"
00025 #include "boost/preprocessor/logical/and.hpp"
00026 #include "boost/preprocessor/identity.hpp"
00027 #include "boost/preprocessor/empty.hpp"
00028 
00029 // BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL(1,T): , T1 = void_, .., Tn = void_
00030 // BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL(2,T): , T2 = void_, .., Tn = void_
00031 // BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL(n,T): <nothing>
00032 
00033 #if !defined(BOOST_MPL_NO_OWN_PP_PRIMITIVES)
00034 
00035 #   include "boost/mpl/aux_/preprocessor/filter_params.hpp"
00036 #   include "boost/mpl/aux_/preprocessor/sub.hpp"
00037 
00038 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_IMPL(i, param, value_func) \
00039     BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_DELAY_1( \
00040           i \
00041         , BOOST_MPL_PP_SUB(BOOST_MPL_METAFUNCTION_MAX_ARITY,i) \
00042         , param \
00043         , value_func \
00044         ) \
00045     
00046 
00047 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_DELAY_1(i, n, param, value_func) \
00048     BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_DELAY_2(i,n,param,value_func) \
00049     
00050 
00051 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_DELAY_2(i, n, param, value_func) \
00052     BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(BOOST_PP_AND(i,n)) \
00053     BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_##i(n,param,value_func) \
00054     
00055 
00056 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_0(i,p,v) BOOST_MPL_PP_FILTER_PARAMS_##i(p##1 v(),p##2 v(),p##3 v(),p##4 v(),p##5 v(),p##6 v(),p##7 v(),p##8 v(),p##9 v())
00057 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_1(i,p,v) BOOST_MPL_PP_FILTER_PARAMS_##i(p##2 v(),p##3 v(),p##4 v(),p##5 v(),p##6 v(),p##7 v(),p##8 v(),p##9 v(),p1)
00058 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_2(i,p,v) BOOST_MPL_PP_FILTER_PARAMS_##i(p##3 v(),p##4 v(),p##5 v(),p##6 v(),p##7 v(),p##8 v(),p##9 v(),p1,p2)
00059 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_3(i,p,v) BOOST_MPL_PP_FILTER_PARAMS_##i(p##4 v(),p##5 v(),p##6 v(),p##7 v(),p##8 v(),p##9 v(),p1,p2,p3)
00060 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_4(i,p,v) BOOST_MPL_PP_FILTER_PARAMS_##i(p##5 v(),p##6 v(),p##7 v(),p##8 v(),p##9 v(),p1,p2,p3,p4)
00061 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_5(i,p,v) BOOST_MPL_PP_FILTER_PARAMS_##i(p##6 v(),p##7 v(),p##8 v(),p##9 v(),p1,p2,p3,p4,p5)
00062 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_6(i,p,v) BOOST_MPL_PP_FILTER_PARAMS_##i(p##7 v(),p##8 v(),p##9 v(),p1,p2,p3,p4,p5,p6)
00063 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_7(i,p,v) BOOST_MPL_PP_FILTER_PARAMS_##i(p##8 v(),p##9 v(),p1,p2,p3,p4,p5,p6,p7)
00064 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_8(i,p,v) BOOST_MPL_PP_FILTER_PARAMS_##i(p##9 v(),p1,p2,p3,p4,p5,p6,p7,p8)
00065 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_9(i,p,v) BOOST_MPL_PP_FILTER_PARAMS_##i(p1,p2,p3,p4,p5,p6,p7,p8,p9)
00066 
00067 #else
00068 
00069 #   include "boost/preprocessor/arithmetic/add.hpp"
00070 #   include "boost/preprocessor/arithmetic/sub.hpp"
00071 #   include "boost/preprocessor/inc.hpp"
00072 #   include "boost/preprocessor/tuple/elem.hpp"
00073 #   include "boost/preprocessor/repeat.hpp"
00074 #   include "boost/preprocessor/cat.hpp"
00075 
00076 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_AUX_TAIL_PARAM_FUNC(unused, i, op) \
00077     BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(i) \
00078     BOOST_PP_CAT( \
00079           BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(3, 1, op) \
00080         , BOOST_PP_ADD_D(1, i, BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(3, 0, op))) \
00081         ) BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(3, 2, op)() \
00082     
00083 
00084 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_IMPL(i, param, value_func) \
00085     BOOST_PP_REPEAT_1( \
00086           BOOST_PP_SUB_D(1, BOOST_MPL_METAFUNCTION_MAX_ARITY, i) \
00087         , BOOST_MPL_PP_AUX_TAIL_PARAM_FUNC \
00088         , (i, param, value_func) \
00089         ) \
00090     
00091 
00092 #endif // BOOST_MPL_NO_OWN_PP_PRIMITIVES
00093 
00094 #define BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL(i, param, value) \
00095     BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_IMPL(i, param, BOOST_PP_IDENTITY(=value)) \
00096     
00097 
00098 #if !defined(BOOST_NO_DEFAULT_TEMPLATE_PARAMETERS_IN_NESTED_TEMPLATES)
00099 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_NESTED_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL(i, param, value) \
00100     BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_IMPL(i, param, BOOST_PP_IDENTITY(=value)) \
00101     
00102 #else
00103 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_NESTED_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL(i, param, value) \
00104     BOOST_MPL_PP_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_IMPL(i, param, BOOST_PP_EMPTY) \
00105     
00106 #endif
00107 
00108 #endif // BOOST_MPL_AUX_PREPROCESSOR_DEF_PARAMS_TAIL_HPP_INCLUDED
